akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7536. Equipment: post bakeries, schools, kitchens, and mess halls Money necessary for the following items for the use of enlisted members of the Army may be spent from appropriations for regular supplies:(1) Equipment for post bakeries.
(2) Furniture, textbooks, paper, and equipment for post schools.
(3) Tableware and mess furniture for kitchens and mess halls.
(Aug. 10, 1956, ch. 1041, 70A Stat. 254, § 4536; renumbered § 7536, Pub. L. 115–232, div. A, title VIII, § 808(d), Aug. 13, 2018, 132 Stat. 1839.)
